text: Mandal is a subdistrict, an administrative division of some countries of South Asia. Mandal may also refer to: ==People== *Mandal (surname) ==Places== ===India=== *Mandal tehsil, a tehsil in Bhilwara district in the state of Rajasthan *Mandal (tehsil), a taluka of Ahmedabad District in Gujarat **Mandal, Gujarat, a town in Mandal taluka, Gujarat *Mandal, Uttarakhand a village in Chamoli district in Uttarakhand ===Mongolia=== *Mandal, Selenge, a district in Selenge Province in Mongolia ===Norway=== *Mandal (town), a town in Lindesnes municipality in Agder county, Norway *Mandal, Norway, a former municipality in Agder county, Norway *Mandal Airfield, an airfield in Mandal municipality in Agder county, Norway *Mandal Church, a church in Mandal municipality in Agder county, Norway ===United States=== *Mandal, United States Virgin Islands, a settlement on the island of St. Thomas in the United States Virgin Islands ==Other== *Bharat Itihas Sanshodhak Mandal, commonly known as Mandal, a historical institute in India *Mandal Commission, a 1979 commission in India on affirmative action *The tuning pegs on a Turkish kanun are called mandals ==See also== * Mandalgovi, Mongolia
title: Mandal (disambiguation)
